DOC.brief_summary: Prospective multicenter observational study develop validate preterm birth risk predictor , use preterm cutoff 37 0/7 week gestation 35 0/7 week gestation . A single maternal peripheral blood sample collect analysis . Data relate potential risk factor preterm birth obtain maternal interview review medical record . Subjects follow delivery process ass course pregnancy , labor , document related maternal complication . Neonatal outcomes gather medical record 28 day life discharge , whichever occur first .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Assessment Spontaneous Preterm Birth Risk Predictor
DOC.criteria: Subject 18 year age old Subject singleton gestation Subject able provide consent Gestational age confirm documented crown rump length ultrasound perform study site within 6 0/7 week 13 6/7 week gestation ( first trimester ) Subject sign and/or symptom preterm labor intact membrane Investigator believe subject willing comply study visit procedure Investigator believe subject 's delivery data available within 15 business day delivery , neonatal data available data collection purpose within 15 business day The subject plan cesarean section induction labor prior 370/7 week gestation The subject plan cerclage placement current pregnancy There know suspect fetal anomaly chromosomal abnormality The subject blood transfusion current pregnancy The subject know elevated bilirubin level ( hyperbilirubinemia ) The subject take plan take follow medication current pregnancy : Progesterone progesteronederivative medication 13 6/7 week gestation Enoxaparin , heparin , heparin sodium , low molecular weight heparin first day last menstrual period The subject participate , plan participate , interventional treatment study current pregnancy The current pregnancy previously multiple gestation single fetus due reduction , vanish twin , etc .
